## Esna 168 {-}  
  
- Location: Column C, middle bandeau  
- Date: Domitian  
- [Hieroglyphic Text](https://www.ifao.egnet.net/uploads/publications/enligne/Temples-Esna002.pdf#page=358){target="_blank"}

<div class="col2">  
  
*nṯr nfr stp n ṯnn  *  
  *ḫnty ms.w=f  *  
*ṯny.n=f ḥr-tp ndb.wt=f  *  
*ỉr.n=f ḥb-sd.w ʿšȝ  *  
*(twmtyns ḫ(wỉ)) *  
  
The good god, chosen by Tatenen,  
  from among his children,  
he distinguished him above his lands,  
and made for him numerous Sed Festivals:  
(Domitian Augustus)
